bug.short_desc: cluster ssh error when pasting tabs - Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Error occurs when pasting from a Gnome-Terminal to Cluster SSH control window. Tabs are not pasted and error is produced
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): clusterssh-4.07-1.fc24.noarch
How reproducible:occurs anytime a tab is pasted in control windows
Steps to Reproduce: 1. create a file with tabs (example /etc/hosts) 2. cssh to hosts 3. vi foo and paste into control window.
Actual results: error Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9) Unknown character in xmodmap keytable: (9)
tabs are omitted from output
Expected results: tabs are included in paste
Additional info:
Note: Error only occurs going from gnome-terminal to clusterssh, if copied from xterm error is not produced.
